overview: Kevin is down on his luck. Him and his wife, Alice, can no longer afford the expensive medication for their ill son, Logan. Without the knowledge of his wife, Kevin begins working for criminal mastermind, Scott. Kevinâ€™s best friend, Jay, joins him and together they must finish one last job for Scott so that they could be rich for life. Unfortunately, the reward comes with a deadly price.
tagline: There are seven deadly sins. Greed is the deadliest.
title: MacGuffin
